00003 inline double& _drovector::operator()(const long& i) const
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _drovector::operator()(const long&) const"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if( i<0 || L<=i ){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] _drovector::operator()(const long&) const"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "The required component is out of the vector size."
00015               << std::endl
00016               << "Your input was (" << i << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   return Array[i];
00022 }

00030 {
00031 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE

00033             << std::endl;
00034 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE

00038

00048 inline void _drovector::write(const char* filename) const
00049 {
00050 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00051   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _drovector::write(const char*) const"
00052             << std::endl;
00053 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00054   
00055   std::ofstream s(filename, std::ios::trunc);
00056   
00057   s << "drovector" << " " << L << std::endl;
00058   for(long i=0; i<L; i++){
00059     s << operator()(i) << " ";
00060   }
00061   s << std::endl;
00062   
00063   s.close();
00064   destroy();
00065 }
